section.heading: Additional standards for providers of low barrier shelter.
section.text: In addition to the requirements in §§ 4-754.21 and 4-754.22, providers of low barrier shelter shall provide:

para.text: Case management services with an appropriately trained, qualified, and supervised case manager, which shall include the development of a service plan;

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 4-754.24 and § 4-754.25.
